title: Rapiers
content:
Rapiers in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Rapiers are Finesse Martial Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-8 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Piercing Damage, though some special Rapiers also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Rapiers have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Rapiers in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Flourish, Piercing Strike, and Weakening Strike.
